pages.text: Jellyfish in modern forms have existed since at least the Cambrian period, and in very similar forms before even then. This exact species is a modern species but entirely similar to what has existed since ancient times. The Atlantic sea nettle is a jellyfish which inhabits the Atlantic coast of the United States. These jellyfish can sting and is severe to smaller prey but is not potent enough to kill humans.
